name: Plunder (itch) (AhomiGoi)
description:
A short story where you play as William. William is a resident of God's Realm, The twisted thing about this is that every decade, One resident of both sides (God's and Devil's) gets infected "As Above so Below." They call this infection "The Adam's Apple Disease." Unfortunaly, Our dear William was the chosen one to get the infection. When someone in God's Realm gets the disease they Exile the infected since they only bring problems and makes things go unstable. Meanwhile, They open their arms to welcome the Demon's son into the realm. William didn't like that at all, so he went to the Devil's Realm to make order and bring caos to The God's Realm.

Keep in mind

This short game was made in one week, as for the Epic MegaJam required. Things are unpolished (mainly animations, hand's model, weapon,  enemies and there's no sound) since I was the one doing all these tasks I couldnt do more than that. With that said, I really hope you enjoy the game if you wish to play it.

Hardware Requirements at least RTX 2000 series 12gb Ram Controls Left click- fire WASD- Movement R- Reload L Shift- Run

enjoy!
